document_data.name: ''Ever-seeing eye''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''ever-seeing eye''''' was a [[magic]]al [[amulet]] crafted by the [[hag]] [[Auntie Ethel]].
document_data.Description: The amulet took the form of a single [[humanoid]] eye suspended by winding branches that were taken from the limbs of a dead tree. The eye was taken from a foolhardy woman that once imposed herself upon Ethel by begging her a single favor.
document_data.Powers: The wielder of the ''ever-seeing eye'' could gain temporary ''[[Protection from evil and good|protection against both]]'' morally just and especially malevolent beings alike, for a short amount of time.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Auntie Ethel]], the hag that crafted the necklace from one of her often-encountered solicitors.
